results.message: Fix this implementation of 'IDisposable' to conform to the dispose pattern.

Analyzer 'SonarAnalyzer.Rules.CSharp.ObjectsShouldNotBeDisposedMoreThanOnce' threw an exception of type 'System.InvalidCastException' with message 'Unable to cast object of type 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Syntax.MemberBindingExpressionSyntax' to type 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Syntax.MemberAccessExpressionSyntax'.'.

S3881.fullDescription: The IDisposable interface is a mechanism to release unmanaged resources, if not implemented correctly this could result in resource leaks or more severe bugs.
